age declined from 28.3% to 20.7% (1.52 ppt/year). 
The BIDANI programme showed positive impact on weight for age, though there were some 
issues with implementation. The ECD programme has had some significant effectiveness 
and could have potentially had even better results with improved implementation. The ECD 
programme showed positive evidence for the influence of community-based programmes on 
improved nutrition status with solid results in reducing prevalenc
